tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentFailureData (
  equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  failure_date DATE,
  failure_type VARCHAR,
  failure_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_failure_data (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  failure_type VARCHAR(50),
  failure_date DATE,
  information TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE preventive_maintenance_schedule (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  scheduled_date DATE,
  technician VARCHAR(100),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
  schedule_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (schedule_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_failure_data(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analysis_data (
  data_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  analysis_result TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (data_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES remote_monitoring_system(system_id)
);
